subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Nery Castillo scored twice as Mexico hammered Paraguay, 6-0, yesterday in their Copa América quarterfinal in Maturin, Venezuela. Mexico handed Paraguay its worst defeat since 1980, when it lost by the same score to Brazil. Mexico advanced to a semifinal game Wednesday against the tournament favorite Argentina, which defeated Peru yesterday, 4-0. Brazil plays Uruguay tomorrow in the other semifinal.
